Uses of Interface
com.threerings.media.image.ImageManager.OptimalImageCreator

Packages that use ImageManager.OptimalImageCreator
com.threerings.media.image   
 

Uses of ImageManager.OptimalImageCreator in com.threerings.media.image
 

Classes in com.threerings.media.image that implement ImageManager.OptimalImageCreator
 class AWTImageCreator
          If the user of the image manager services intends to create and display images using the AWT, they can use this image creator which will use the AWT to determine the optimal image format.
 

Methods in com.threerings.media.image that return ImageManager.OptimalImageCreator
 ImageManager.OptimalImageCreator ImageManager.getImageCreator()
          Returns the image creator that can be used to create buffered images optimized for rendering to the screen.
 

Constructors in com.threerings.media.image with parameters of type ImageManager.OptimalImageCreator
ClientImageManager(ResourceManager rmgr, ImageManager.OptimalImageCreator icreator)
           
ImageManager(ResourceManager rmgr, ImageManager.OptimalImageCreator icreator)
          Construct an image manager with the specified ResourceManager from which it will obtain its data.
